name: Beat the BH4 Magician under 23 seconds without using run and helicopter
Enter Anguish Lagoon for the first time with 13 lives and 5 cages
Successfully finish 6 magicians
Beat the 2nd screen of Twilight Gulch without taking a hit
Get all 7 1ups in Hard rocks
Get all 6 1ups in Eat at Joe's
Hit all 6 cages in 3 different levels
Beat mr sax with only 12 punches and without getting hit
Beat Bongo hills without dying and without taking damage while getting all cages
Beat allegro presto without having the ring grab powerup
beat EP while only pressing run and helicopter once
Collect 5 cages in twilight gulch without getting hit
Beat Pencil Pentathlon without running nor helicoptering in screens 1 and 3
Get all cages in EAJ in reverse order
Touch the Extra end signs of HR1 and SMC1
in PP2, Collect all 60 tings & reach the endsign without taking a hit
Grimace 69 times
Get 1 cage in every level except for CP/EAJ/MSS
Die in every screen of blue mountains
Take the skops photographer, then get all cages in reverse order without leaving the screen
Kill 6 different tall living stones in PPW without using punch and without taking damage in between
Beat Space Mama while having exactly 19 cages
Clip 5 times in Mr Sax's Hullaballoo without pressing down
Do a superjump in picture city
Beat SMC1 while only being able to touch 1 pink eraser
